short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring MacOS 2-finger double-tap to Chromium browsers on all OSes. Double right-click to zoom in and out (or ESC to zoom out)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring MacOS 2 fingers double-tap to Chromium browsers on all OSes.
Double right-click to zoom-in, double right-click again or ESC to zoom-out.

Github: https://github.com/letuanhai/chrome-smart-zoom

Credit:
zoom.js by Hakim El Hattab
Icon: https://dryicons.com/free-icons/double-finger
